price: ووايه: دا علم خو يوازې له الله سره دى او زه خو ايله يو څرګند وېروونكى يم.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā al-ʿil'mu ʿinda al-lahi wa-innamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
